alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:51AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 950 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Spiro to 5 miles southeast of Cameron. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Greenwood... Pocola... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Hackett... Bonanza... Cameron... Excelsior... Jenny Lind... Rock Island... Scullyville... Braden... Mill Creek... Rye Hill... Jenson... Cottonwood... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 321 and 324. Interstate 540 between mile markers 11 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
